alert.note: Alert for Cuyahoga; Medina; Summit (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 25 at 3:00PM EDT until July 25 at 3:30PM EDT by NWS Cleveland
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 330 PM EDT FOR NORTHEASTERN MEDINA...SOUTH CENTRAL CUYAHOGA AND NORTHWESTERN SUMMIT COUNTIES... At 300 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located 7 miles southeast of North Royalton, or 12 miles northeast of Medina, moving south at 10 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Doppler radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to trees and power lines. Locations impacted include... Akron, Cuyahoga Falls, North Royalton, Broadview Heights, Brecksville, Hinckley, Richfield and Montrose-Ghent. HAIL THREAT...OBSERVED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
